name: lisa mcdowell
text: This is the most amazing store. From the staff & owner is so nice and helpful to The bras bras being like no other. I thought it was just a specialty store but they have regular bras that beat any other stores(Lane Bryant & VS). They are made high quality and feel like you are wearing nothing but very supportive and sexy. I have already been back two more times for more and thrown away all my old bras. Thank you for the great customer service and product.

name: Nancy Graham
text: This is the best place for a new bra. I just could not find a bra that fit my big girl breast , but now I have !!!!!! The owner is great she did not even have to measure me,  just took and look and came back with the right sizes.  I have never had cancer or any problems other then not being fit good.  GO by The New You Bra Boutique and see what she has for you.... THE BEST AROUND !

name: Linda Cargal
text: Very Helpful and  Friendly people who need help and support  after Mastectomy  .

name: amber cockrel
text: Love this place they are very nice
